item.text: These are the statutes and ordinances you must be careful to obey as long as you live in the land the Lord, the God of your ancestors, has given you to possess.

You must not worship the Lord your God the way they worship.

<st data-num="03588" class="">But</st> you must <st data-num="01875" class="">seek</st> <st data-num="0518" class="">only</st> the <st data-num="04725 0834">place</st> <st data-num="03068 0430">he</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0977" class="">chooses</st> from <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> your <st data-num="07626" class="">tribes</st> to <st data-num="07760" class="">establish</st> his <st data-num="08034" class="">name</st> as his <st data-num="08033" class="">place</st> of <st data-num="07933" class="">residence</st>,<n id="2" /> and you must <st data-num="0935" class="">go</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st>.

And <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st> you must <st data-num="0935" class="">take</st> your <st data-num="05930" class="">burnt offerings</st>, your <st data-num="02077" class="">sacrifices</st>, your <st data-num="04643" class="">tithes</st>, the <st data-num="08641">personal offerings</st> you have <st data-num="03027" class="">prepared</st>,<n id="1" /> your <st data-num="05088" class="">votive offerings</st>, your <st data-num="05071" class="">freewill offerings</st>, and the <st data-num="01062" class="">firstborn</st> of your <st data-num="01241" class="">herds</st> and <st data-num="06629" class="">flocks</st>.
Both you and your families must feast there before the Lord your God and rejoice in all the output of your labor with which he has blessed you.

You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st> <st data-num="03605 0834">as</st> <st data-num="0587" class="">we</st> are <st data-num="06213" class="">doing</st> <st data-num="06311" class="">here</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">today</st>, with <st data-num="0376" class="">everyone</st><n id="1" /> doing <st data-num="03605 03477">what seems best</st> to <st data-num="05869" class="">him</st>,
for you have not yet come to the final stop and inheritance the Lord your God is giving you.

When you do <st data-num="05674" class="">go across</st> the <st data-num="03383" class="">Jordan</st> River<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="03427" class="">settle</st> in the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="03068 0430">he</st><n id="2" /> is <st data-num="05157" class="">granting</st> you <st data-num="05157" class="">as an inheritance</st> and you <st data-num="05117" class="">find relief</st> from <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="0341" class="">enemies</st> who <st data-num="05439" class="">surround</st> you, you will <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> in <st data-num="0983" class="">safety</st>.<n id="3" />

Then you must come to the place the Lord your God chooses for his name to reside, bringing everything I am commanding you—your burnt offerings, sacrifices, tithes, the personal offerings you have prepared, and all your choice votive offerings that you devote to him.

You shall rejoice in the presence of the Lord your God, along with your sons, daughters, male and female servants, and the Levites in your villages (since they have no allotment or inheritance with you).

<st data-num="08104" class="">Make sure</st> you do <st data-num="06435" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05927" class="">offer</st> <st data-num="05930" class="">burnt offerings</st> in <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st> you <st data-num="07200" class="">wish</st>,
for you may do so only in the place the Lord chooses in one of your tribal areas—there you may do everything I am commanding you.

On the other hand, you may slaughter and eat meat as you please when the Lord your God blesses you in all your villages. Both the ritually pure and impure may eat it, whether it is a gazelle or an ibex.

<st data-num="07535" class="">However</st>, you must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st>—<st data-num="08210" class="">pour</st> it <st data-num="08210" class="">out</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">ground</st> like <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st>.

You will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="03201" class="">allowed</st> to <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> in your <st data-num="08179" class="">villages</st> your <st data-num="04643" class="">tithe</st> of <st data-num="01715" class="">grain</st>, <st data-num="08492" class="">new wine</st>, <st data-num="03323" class="">olive oil</st>, the <st data-num="01062" class="">firstborn</st> of your <st data-num="01241" class="">herd</st> and <st data-num="06629" class="">flock</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> <st data-num="05088" class="">votive offerings</st> you have <st data-num="05087" class="">vowed</st>, or your <st data-num="05071" class="">freewill</st> and <st data-num="03027" class="">personal</st> <st data-num="05071 08641">offerings</st>.

Only in the presence of the Lord your God may you eat these, in the place he chooses. This applies to you, your son, your daughter, your male and female servants, and the Levites in your villages. In that place you will rejoice before the Lord your God in all the output of your labor.
Be careful not to overlook the Levites as long as you live in the land.
When the Lord your God extends your borders as he said he would do and you say, “I want to eat meat just as I please,” you may do so as you wish.

<st data-num="03588" class="">If</st> the <st data-num="04725 0834">place</st> <st data-num="03068 0430">he</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0977" class="">chooses</st> to <st data-num="07760 08033">locate</st> his <st data-num="08034" class="">name</st> <st data-num="07368" class="">is</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">too</st> <st data-num="07368" class="">far</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">for</st> you, you may <st data-num="02076" class="">slaughter</st> any of your <st data-num="01241" class="">herd</st> and <st data-num="06629" class="">flock</st> <st data-num="03068" class="">he</st><n id="2" /> has <st data-num="05414" class="">given</st> you just <st data-num="0834" class="">as</st> I have <st data-num="06680" class="">stipulated</st>; you may <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> them in your <st data-num="08179" class="">villages</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">just</st> as you <st data-num="0185 05315">wish</st>.

<st data-num="0834" class="">As</st> you <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> the <st data-num="06643" class="">gazelle</st> or <st data-num="0354" class="">ibex</st>, <st data-num="03651" class="">so</st> you may <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> these; the <st data-num="02931" class="">ritually impure</st> and <st data-num="02889" class="">pure</st> <st data-num="03162" class="">alike</st> may <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> them.

<st data-num="07535" class="">However</st>, <st data-num="02388" class="">by</st> <st data-num="01115" class="">no</st> <st data-num="02388" class="">means</st> <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> the <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st> is <st data-num="05315" class="">life</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">itself</st><n id="1" />—you must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> the <st data-num="05315" class="">life</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="01320" class="">meat</st>.

You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> it! You must <st data-num="08210" class="">pour</st> it <st data-num="08210" class="">out</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">ground</st> like <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st>.
You must not eat it so that it may go well with you and your children after you; you will be doing what is right in the Lord’s sight.
But the holy things and votive offerings that belong to you, you must pick up and take to the place the Lord will choose.
You must offer your burnt offerings, both meat and blood, on the altar of the Lord your God; the blood of your other sacrifices you must pour out on his altar while you eat the meat.
Pay careful attention to all these things I am commanding you so that it may always go well with you and your children after you when you do what is good and right in the sight of the Lord your God.
When the Lord your God eliminates the nations from the place where you are headed and you dispossess them, you will settle down in their land.

<st data-num="0310" class="">After</st> they have been <st data-num="08045" class="">destroyed</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">from</st> your <st data-num="06440" class="">presence</st>, <st data-num="08104" class="">be careful</st> <st data-num="06435" class="">not</st> to be <st data-num="05367" class="">ensnared</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">like</st> they are; do <st data-num="06435" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01875" class="">pursue</st> their <st data-num="0430" class="">gods</st> and <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st>, “<st data-num="0349" class="">How</st> do <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st> <st data-num="05647" class="">serve</st> their <st data-num="0430" class="">gods</st>? <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> will <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st> the <st data-num="03651 01571">same</st>.”

You must not worship the Lord your God the way they do! For everything that is abhorrent to him, everything he hates, they have done when worshiping their gods. They even burn up their sons and daughters before their gods!
(13:1) You must be careful to do everything I am commanding you. Do not add to it or subtract from it!
